Aerial Combatant.1: Killing an enemy player restores 12% jump jet fuel. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
Aerial Combatant.2: Killing an enemy player restores 15% jump jet fuel. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
Aerial Combatant.3: Killing an enemy player restores 20% jump jet fuel. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
Aerial Combatant.4: Killing an enemy player restores 30% jump jet fuel. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
Aerial Combatant.5: Killing an enemy player restores 30% jump jet fuel, and vehicle kills now trigger this bonus as well. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>

Ammo Printer.1: Restocks one tick of ammunition for all infantry weapons and the weapons of nearby vehicles you own every 120 seconds.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Ammo Printer.2: Restocks one tick of ammunition for all infantry weapons and the weapons of nearby vehicles you own every 110 seconds.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Ammo Printer.3: Restocks one tick of ammunition for all infantry weapons and the weapons of nearby vehicles you own every 90 seconds.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Ammo Printer.4: Restocks one tick of ammunition for all infantry weapons and the weapons of nearby vehicles you own every 75 seconds.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Ammo Printer.5: Restocks one tick of ammunition for all infantry weapons and the weapons of nearby vehicles you own every 60 seconds.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>

Analysis HUD.desc: While equipped, the player will be able to locate campaign targets from much further away. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.</font>

Assassin.1: Kills from greater than 150 meters will clear spot checks on you, and prevent spotting attempts on you for one second. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not clear spot checks on vehicles.</font>
Assassin.2: Kills from greater than 125 meters will clear spot checks on you, and prevent spotting attempts on you for one second. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not clear spot checks on vehicles.</font>
Assassin.3: Kills from greater than 100 meters will clear spot checks on you, and prevent spotting attempts on you for one second. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not clear spot checks on vehicles.</font>
Assassin.4: Kills from greater than 50 meters will clear spot checks on you, and prevent spotting attempts on you for one second. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not clear spot checks on vehicles.</font>
Assassin.5: Kills from greater than 50 meters, or headshot kills, will clear spot checks on you, and prevent spotting attempts on you for one second. In addition, dealing damage to enemies will now automatically spot them for you and nearby allies. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not clear spot checks on vehicles.</font>

Assimilate.1: On a headshot kill, instantly restore 120 shield.
Assimilate.2: On a headshot kill, instantly restore 140 shield.
Assimilate.3: On a headshot kill, instantly restore 165 shield.
Assimilate.4: On a headshot kill, instantly restore 200 shield.
Assimilate.5: On a headshot kill, instantly restore 200 shield and 10% of your maximum ability energy.

Athlete.1: Passively increases sprint acceleration, deceleration, and recovery speed by 10%, and your hold-breath time recharges 50% faster.
Athlete.2: Passively increases sprint acceleration, deceleration, and recovery speed by 12%, and your hold-breath time recharges 65% faster.
Athlete.3: Passively increases sprint acceleration, deceleration, and recovery speed by 15%, and your hold-breath time recharges 80% faster.
Athlete.4: Passively increases sprint acceleration, deceleration, and recovery speed by 20%, and your hold-breath time recharges 100% faster.
Athlete.5: Passively increases sprint acceleration, deceleration, and recovery speed by 20%, and your hold-breath time recharges 100% faster. Additionally, you gain 10% increased sprint speed whenever you've been moving for longer than 6 seconds. This bonus is removed if you stop moving or fire a weapon.

Avoidance.desc: Your movements no longer trigger Claymores, Proximity Mines, or Bouncing Betty, and the range at which Spitfire Turrets can acquire you is reduced by 50%.

Battle Hardened.1: Reduces camera shake and flinch from explosions and bullet impacts by 30%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Battle Hardened.2: Reduces camera shake and flinch from explosions and bullet impacts by 33%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Battle Hardened.3: Reduces camera shake and flinch from explosions and bullet impacts by 40%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Battle Hardened.4: Reduces camera shake and flinch from explosions and bullet impacts by 50%.<font color="#dc9c36"> MAX units can equip.</font>
Battle Hardened.5: Reduces camera shake and flinch from explosions and bullet impacts by 50%, and killing a target will double this bonus for the next 10 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>

Bionics.desc: Your personal shield health is increased by 400, and 400 health is removed from your health pool.

Bionics [Perfect].desc:
Your personal shield health is increased by 400, and 400 health is removed from your health pool.

Perfect implants cannot be broken down.

Carapace.desc: Your personal shield is removed and replaced with 500 additional health. Equipment that adds or modifies shield health does not stack with this implant.

Carapace [Perfect].desc:
Your personal shield is removed and replaced with 500 additional health. Equipment that adds or modifies shield health does not stack with this implant.

Perfect implants cannot be broken down.

Catlike.1: Reduces the movement speed penalty for crouching by 40%.
Catlike.2: Reduces the movement speed penalty for crouching by 45%.
Catlike.3: Reduces the movement speed penalty for crouching by 55%.
Catlike.4: Reduces the movement speed penalty for crouching by 75%.
Catlike.5: Reduces the movement speed penalty for crouching by 75%, and you gain increased jumping height.

Cold Heart.desc: When killing an enemy with a headshot, your heat weapons receive 20% faster recovery delay and cooldown rates for 3 seconds. Additionally, heat-based Tools receive this benefit passively at all times.

Combat Surgeon.1: Kills and revives restore 15% of your Nano-Regen Device energy. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
Combat Surgeon.2: Kills and revives restore 18% of your Nano-Regen Device energy. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
Combat Surgeon.3: Kills and revives restore 23% of your Nano-Regen Device energy. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
Combat Surgeon.4: Kills and revives restore 30% of your Nano-Regen Device energy. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
Combat Surgeon.5: Kills and revives restore 30% of your Nano-Regen Device energy, and reviving an ally increases your resistance to small arms damage by 25% for 3.5 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>

Counter-Intelligence.desc: You automatically spot targets who damage you, and while not inside a vehicle, you are also notified on the HUD when spotted by an enemy.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>

Counter-Intelligence [Perfect].desc:
You automatically spot targets who damage you, and while not inside a vehicle, you are also notified on the HUD when spotted by an enemy. Works in vehicles. MAX units can equip.

Perfect implants cannot be broken down.

Covert Drop.1: Taking fall damage will cloak you for 1 second. Firing a weapon will reveal you.
Covert Drop.2: Taking fall damage will cloak you for 1.25 seconds. Firing a weapon will reveal you.
Covert Drop.3: Taking fall damage will cloak you for 1.75 seconds. Firing a weapon will reveal you.
Covert Drop.4: Taking fall damage will cloak you for 2.5 seconds. Firing a weapon will reveal you.
Covert Drop.5: Taking fall damage will cloak you for 2.5 seconds. Additionally, bailing from an ejection seat aircraft will cloak you for 6 seconds upon hitting the ground. Firing a weapon will reveal you.

Critical Chain.1: Headshot kills grant 20% faster weapon rechamber speed for 2 seconds.<font color="#dc9c36"> Only useable with sniper rifles.</font>
Critical Chain.2: Headshot kills grant 25% faster weapon rechamber speed for 3 seconds.<font color="#dc9c36"> Only useable with Sniper Rifles.</font>
Critical Chain.3: Headshot kills grant 35% faster weapon rechamber speed for 3 seconds; chaining headshots can store a maximum of 5 seconds worth of rechamber speed.<font color="#dc9c36"> Only useable with Sniper Rifles.</font>
Critical Chain.4: Headshot kills grant 50% faster weapon rechamber speed for 3 seconds; chaining headshots can store a maximum of 8 seconds worth of rechamber speed.<font color="#dc9c36"> Only useable with Sniper Rifles.</font>
Critical Chain.5: Headshot kills grant 50% faster weapon rechamber speed for 3 seconds; chaining headshots can store a maximum of 8 seconds worth of rechamber speed. Additionally, kills beyond 70 meters will also trigger this benefit.<font color="#dc9c36"> Only useable with Sniper Rifles.</font>

Deep Operative.1: Whenever you spend longer than a total of 30 seconds outside of cloak without taking damage, your cloak's visibility will be reduced by 75%. Dying or taking damage from enemy sources will reset the benefit countdown. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>
Deep Operative.2: Whenever you spend longer than a total of 26 seconds outside of cloak without taking damage, your cloak's visibility will be reduced by 75%. Dying or taking damage from enemy sources will reset the benefit countdown. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>
Deep Operative.3: Whenever you spend longer than a total of 20 seconds outside of cloak without taking damage, your cloak's visibility will be reduced by 75%. Dying or taking damage from enemy sources will reset the benefit countdown. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>
Deep Operative.4: Whenever you spend longer than a total of 12 seconds outside of cloak without taking damage, your cloak's visibility will be reduced by 75%. Dying or taking damage from enemy sources will reset the benefit countdown. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>
Deep Operative.5: Whenever you spend longer than a total of 12 seconds outside of cloak without taking damage, your cloak's visibility will be reduced by 75%. Additionally, killing an enemy will reduce this countdown by 3 seconds. Dying or taking damage from enemy sources will reset the benefit countdown. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>

Disengage.desc: Activating Emergency Repair will also create an impulse wave that throws enemy infantry a short distance and increases your sprint acceleration speed by 25% for 3 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX only.</font>

Electrotech.1: When your shield breaks, it releases a pulse of repairing nanites that heal allied mechanical objects within 10m for 250 health over 4 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>
Electrotech.2: When your shield breaks, it releases a pulse of repairing nanites that heal allied mechanical objects within 10m for 263 health over 4 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>
Electrotech.3: When your shield breaks, it releases a pulse of repairing nanites that heal allied mechanical objects within 10m for 275 health over 4 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>
Electrotech.4: When your shield breaks, it releases a pulse of repairing nanites that heal allied mechanical objects within 10m for 300 health over 4 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>
Electrotech.5: When your shield breaks, it releases a pulse of repairing nanites that heal allied mechanical objects within 10m for 300 health over 4 seconds, short circuits small enemy deployables within range of the pulse. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>

Experimental Stims.desc: When using a Medical Kit or Restoration Kit, you receive a random increase to sprint speed, reload speed, or small arms resistance for a short time.

Failsafe.1: When your shield is broken, you gain 10% of your maximum ability energy. This action can only occur once every 12 seconds.
Failsafe.2: When your shield is broken, you gain 12% of your maximum ability energy. This action can only occur once every 12 seconds.
Failsafe.3: When your shield is broken, you gain 15% of your maximum ability energy. This action can only occur once every 12 seconds.
Failsafe.4: When your shield is broken, you gain 20% of your maximum ability energy. This action can only occur once every 12 seconds.
Failsafe.5: When your shield is broken, you gain 20% of your maximum ability energy. This action can only occur once every 12 seconds. Additionally, whenever Failsafe is on cooldown, receiving melee damage will shock the attacker for 150 non-lethal damage.

Firestorm.1: Killing an enemy increases rate of fire by 8% for 1.5 seconds. While this effect is active, your recoil and cone of fire bloom suffer significantly.
Firestorm.2: Killing an enemy increases rate of fire by 8% for 1.75 seconds. While this effect is active, your recoil and cone of fire bloom suffer significantly.
Firestorm.3: Killing an enemy increases rate of fire by 8% for 2.25 seconds. While this effect is active, your recoil and cone of fire bloom suffer significantly.
Firestorm.4: Killing an enemy increases rate of fire by 8% for 3 seconds. While this effect is active, your recoil and cone of fire bloom suffer significantly.
Firestorm.5: Killing an enemy increases rate of fire by 8% for 3 seconds, and a headshot kill will increase this duration to 5 seconds. While this effect is active, your recoil and cone of fire bloom suffer significantly.

Firewall.desc: Interacting with allied base turrets or spitfire turrets embed them with firewalls which must be disarmed by enemy infiltrators before hacking. Firewalls last 360 seconds and grant turrets an additional 25% maximum health. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>

Fortify.1: Standing still for 1 second provides you with 20% small arms resistance to bodyshots until you start moving again. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not stack with Nanoweave Armor. Inactive in vehicles.</font>
Fortify.2: Standing still for 0.75 seconds provides you with 20% small arms resistance to bodyshots until you start moving again. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not stack with Nanoweave Armor. Inactive in vehicles.</font>
Fortify.3: Standing still for 0.5 seconds provides you with 20% small arms resistance to bodyshots until you start moving again. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not stack with Nanoweave Armor. Inactive in vehicles.</font>
Fortify.4: Standing still for 0.1 second provides you with 20% small arms resistance to bodyshots until you start moving again. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not stack with Nanoweave Armor. Inactive in vehicles.</font>
Fortify.5: Standing still for 0.1 second provides you with 20% small arms resistance to bodyshots, and 50% resistance to common explosives until you start moving again. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not stack with Nanoweave or Flak Armor. Inactive in vehicles.</font>

Gunslinger.1: Kills while wielding a sidearm increase reload speed by 15% for 2 seconds.
Gunslinger.2: Kills while wielding a sidearm increase reload speed by 17% for 2.25 seconds.
Gunslinger.3: Kills while wielding a sidearm increase reload speed by 20% for 2.75 seconds.
Gunslinger.4: Kills while wielding a sidearm increase reload speed by 25% for 3.5 seconds.
Gunslinger.5: Kills while wielding a sidearm increase reload speed by 25% for 3.5 seconds, and your weapon swap times are reduced by 50% for the same duration.

Heavyweight.1: Reduces screen shake caused by explosions by 60%, and you are no longer affected by knockbacks caused by enemies or allies. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Heavyweight.2: Reduces screen shake caused by explosions by 65%, and you are no longer affected by knockbacks caused by enemies or allies. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Heavyweight.3: Reduces screen shake caused by explosions by 75%, and you are no longer affected by knockbacks caused by enemies or allies. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Heavyweight.4: Reduces screen shake caused by explosions by 95%, and you are no longer affected by knockbacks caused by enemies or allies. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Heavyweight.5: Reduces screen shake caused by explosions by 95%, and you are no longer affected by knockbacks caused by enemies or allies. Additionally, whenever you take fall damage, you will emit an impulse that knocks back enemy infantry. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>

Infravision.desc: While equipped, the player will highlight infantry and vehicles within 125 meters at all times, while reducing vision at long range. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip. Does not work in vehicles.</font>

Jockey.1: While riding in an exposed vehicle seat or gunning an Engineer MANA Turret, you receive an additional 30% maximum shield health.
Jockey.2: While riding in an exposed vehicle seat or gunning an Engineer MANA Turret, you receive an additional 33% maximum shield health.
Jockey.3: While riding in an exposed vehicle seat or gunning an Engineer MANA Turret, you receive an additional 40% maximum shield health.
Jockey.4: While riding in an exposed vehicle seat or gunning an Engineer MANA Turret, you receive an additional 50% maximum shield health.
Jockey.5: While riding in an exposed vehicle seat or gunning an Engineer MANA Turret, you receive an additional 50% maximum shield health. Additionally, squadmates in vehicles within 50 meters of you also receive this benefit at 20% shield strength.

Logistics Specialist.desc: While piloting a vehicle, that vehicle becomes capable of spawning squadmates directly into it if there is an open seat.<font color="#dc9c36"> Does not apply to Bastion Fleet Carriers.</font>

Mending Field.1: Allies who are below 100 health passively heal for 15 health per second while you are within 7 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
Mending Field.2: Allies who are below 150 health passively heal for 15 health per second while you are within 7 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
Mending Field.3: Allies who are below 225 health passively heal for 15 health per second while you are within 7 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
Mending Field.4: Allies who are below 300 health passively heal for 15 health per second while you are within 7 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
Mending Field.5: Allies who are below 300 health passively heal for 15 health per second while you are within 7 meters. Your deployed Shield Recharging Fields now also carry this effect. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>

Minor Cloak.desc: Remaining stationary for 8 seconds will cloak the user. Movement will break this cloak, though short bouts of movement will let you return to cloak more quickly after breaking it. Firing a weapon will reset the 8 second recharge countdown.

Mobility Mesh.1: Reduces the movement speed penalty while your overshield is active by 15%. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Mobility Mesh.2: Reduces the movement speed penalty while your overshield is active by 17%. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Mobility Mesh.3: Reduces the movement speed penalty while your overshield is active by 20%. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Mobility Mesh.4: Reduces the movement speed penalty while your overshield is active by 25%. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Mobility Mesh.5: Reduces the movement speed penalty while your overshield is active by 25%. Additionally, while your overshield is active, your base sprint speed is increased by 10%. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>

Nanomesh Specialist.1: Reduces the rate of decay on your overshield by 50% while stationary, and 25% while moving. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Nanomesh Specialist.2: Reduces the rate of decay on your overshield by 55% while stationary, and 28% while moving. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Nanomesh Specialist.3: Reduces the rate of decay on your overshield by 65% while stationary, and 33% while moving. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Nanomesh Specialist.4: Reduces the rate of decay on your overshield by 80% while stationary, and 40% while moving. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Nanomesh Specialist.5: Reduces the rate of decay on your overshield by 80% while stationary, and 40% while moving. Additionally, your depleted overshield no longer has a delay before it begins recharging. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>

Nightmare.1: Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon will cloak you for 1 second. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks. Firing your weapon will immediately decloak you.
Nightmare.2: Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon will cloak you for 1.2 seconds. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks. Firing your weapon will immediately decloak you.
Nightmare.3: Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon will cloak you for 1.5 seconds. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks. Firing your weapon will immediately decloak you.
Nightmare.4: Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon will cloak you for 2 seconds. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks. Firing your weapon will immediately decloak you.
Nightmare.5: Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon, or while within 5 meters of your target will cloak you for 2 seconds. Firing your weapon will immediately decloak you.

Ocular Shield.1: Reduces the duration and effectiveness of Concussion, Flash, and EMP Grenades used against you by 15%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Ocular Shield.2: Reduces the duration and effectiveness of Concussion, Flash, and EMP Grenades used against you by 18%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Ocular Shield.3: Reduces the duration and effectiveness of Concussion, Flash, and EMP Grenades used against you by 23%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Ocular Shield.4: Reduces the duration and effectiveness of Concussion, Flash, and EMP Grenades used against you by 30%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Ocular Shield.5: Reduces the duration and effectiveness of Concussion, Flash, and EMP Grenades used against you 30%; and using a Medical or Restoration Kit provides immunity to these effects for the next 5 seconds, but does not clear effects already applied. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>

Overdrive.1: Roadkills with a Flash or Harasser will restore 25% base turbo energy.
Overdrive.2: Roadkills with a Flash or Harasser will restore 28% base turbo energy.
Overdrive.3: Roadkills with a Flash or Harasser will restore 33% base turbo energy.
Overdrive.4: Roadkills with a Flash or Harasser will restore 40% base turbo energy.
Overdrive.5: Roadkills with a Flash, Harasser, ESF, or Liberator will restore 40% base turbo energy.

Paratrooper.1: Whenever you receive damage, 3% of your maximum jump jet fuel is restored. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
Paratrooper.2: Whenever you receive damage, 4% of your maximum jump jet fuel is restored. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
Paratrooper.3: Whenever you receive damage, 5.5% of your maximum jump jet fuel is restored. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
Paratrooper.4: Whenever you receive damage, 8% of your maximum jump jet fuel is restored. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
Paratrooper.5: Whenever you receive damage, 8% of your maximum jump jet fuel is restored. Additionally, reloading your tool slot will drastically reduce fall damage for 6 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>

Phylactery.desc: Each time you are revived, a charge is added to the phylactery. At 3 charges, your next death will allow you to self-revive once at 50% health. Phylactery's self-revive does not count toward these charges. <font color="#dc9c36">Charges cannot be gained while in a vehicle, and redeploying or using an equipment terminal will wipe your current progress. MAXes can use this implant.</font>

Ransack.1: Killing a vehicle within 25 meters restores one tick of ammunition for you or your vehicle. <font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles.</font>
Ransack.2: Killing a vehicle within 30 meters restores one tick of ammunition for you or your vehicle. <font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles.</font>
Ransack.3: Killing a vehicle within 35 meters restores one tick of ammunition for you or your vehicle. <font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles.</font>
Ransack.4: Killing a vehicle within 50 meters restores one tick of ammunition for you or your vehicle. <font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles.</font>
Ransack.5: Killing a vehicle within 50 meters restores one tick of ammunition for you or your vehicle, and heals your vehicle for 10% max health. <font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles.</font>

Regeneration.1: Regenerates 20 health per second when out of combat for 10 seconds.
Regeneration.2: Regenerates 23 health per second when out of combat for 10 seconds.
Regeneration.3: Regenerates 28 health per second when out of combat for 10 seconds.
Regeneration.4: Regenerates 35 health per second when out of combat for 10 seconds.
Regeneration.5: Regenerates 35 health per second when out of combat for 10 seconds, and headshot kills regenerate 100 health over 2 seconds.

Response Jacket.1: Receiving damage from a standard explosive or light anti-vehicle weapon will trigger a shield that reduces damage from both resistance types by 50% for 6 seconds.
Response Jacket.2: Receiving damage from a standard explosive or light anti-vehicle weapon will trigger a shield that reduces damage from both resistance types by 50% for 8 seconds.
Response Jacket.3: Receiving damage from a standard explosive or light anti-vehicle weapon will trigger a shield that reduces damage from both resistance types by 50% for 12 seconds.
Response Jacket.4: Receiving damage from a standard explosive or light anti-vehicle weapon will trigger a shield that reduces damage from both resistance types by 50% for 20 seconds.
Response Jacket.5: Receiving damage from a standard explosive, light anti-vehicle, C4, or infantry launcher will trigger a shield that reduces damage from all of those resistance types by 50% for 20 seconds.

Revenant.1: Upon being revived, you become cloaked for the next 2 seconds. Firing your weapon will remove this effect.
Revenant.2: Upon being revived, you become cloaked for the next 2.25 seconds. Firing your weapon will remove this effect.
Revenant.3: Upon being revived, you become cloaked for the next 2.5 seconds. Firing your weapon will remove this effect.
Revenant.4: Upon being revived, you become cloaked for the next 3 seconds. Firing your weapon will remove this effect.
Revenant.5: Upon being revived or when reviving another player, you or your target become cloaked for the next 3 seconds. Firing your weapon will remove this effect.

Robotics Technician.1: Non-mine deployables you own within 15m have a 10% resistance to incoming damage, this damage resistance also applies to the Engineer when mounting a deployed MANA turret. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>
Robotics Technician.2: Non-mine deployables you own within 15m have a 13% resistance to incoming damage, this damage resistance also applies to the Engineer when mounting a deployed MANA turret. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>
Robotics Technician.3: Non-mine deployables you own within 15m have a 18% resistance to incoming damage, this damage resistance also applies to the Engineer when mounting a deployed MANA turret. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>
Robotics Technician.4: Non-mine deployables you own within 15m have a 25% resistance to incoming damage, this damage resistance also applies to the Engineer when mounting a deployed MANA turret. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>
Robotics Technician.5: Non-mine deployables you own within 15m have a 25% resistance to incoming damage and will repair themselves for 25 health per second, even while under fire. The damage resistance also applies to the Engineer when mounting a deployed MANA turret. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>

Safe Fall.1: Normal fall damage now starts at 20 meters and lethal fall damage starts near 60 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Safe Fall.2: Normal fall damage now starts at 30 meters and lethal fall damage starts near 90 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Safe Fall.3: Normal fall damage now starts at 40 meters and lethal fall damage starts near 120 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Safe Fall.4: Normal fall damage now starts at 50 meters and lethal fall damage starts near 150 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Safe Fall.5: Normal fall damage now starts at 75 meters, lethal fall damage starts near 230 meters, and you take reduced damage when vehicles collide with you. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>

Safeguard.1: Upon being revived, damage taken is reduced by 20% for 1.5 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Safeguard.2: Upon being revived, damage taken is reduced by 20% for 1.75 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Safeguard.3: Upon being revived, damage taken is reduced by 20% for 2.5 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Safeguard.4: Upon being revived, damage taken is reduced by 20% for 3.5 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Safeguard.5: Upon being revived, damage taken is reduced by 20% for 3.5 seconds, and you instantly restore 200 shield health as infantry, or an extra 500 health while in a MAX suit. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>

Salvage.1: Killing enemy MAX units will restore 500 health. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX only.</font>
Salvage.2: Killing enemy MAX units will restore 550 health. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX only.</font>
Salvage.3: Killing enemy MAX units will restore 650 health. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX only.</font>
Salvage.4: Killing enemy MAX units will restore 800 health. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX only.</font>
Salvage.5: Killing enemy MAX units will restore 800 health, and killing a MAX within 5 meters of you will restore an additional 200 health. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX only.</font>

Sensor Shield.1: Your radar signature no longer appears on detection devices outside of 30 meters.
Sensor Shield.2: Your radar signature no longer appears on detection devices outside of 26 meters.
Sensor Shield.3: Your radar signature no longer appears on detection devices outside of 20 meters.
Sensor Shield.4: Your radar signature no longer appears on detection devices outside of 10 meters.
Sensor Shield.5: Your radar signature no longer appears on detection devices outside of 10 meters, and while walking, you cannot be detected by recon devices at all.

Sidewinder.1: Your strafe speed is increased by 20%, but accelerating and decelerating while strafing takes twice as long.
Sidewinder.2: Your strafe speed is increased by 23%, but accelerating and decelerating while strafing takes twice as long.
Sidewinder.3: Your strafe speed is increased by 28%, but accelerating and decelerating while strafing takes twice as long.
Sidewinder.4: Your strafe speed is increased by 35%, but accelerating and decelerating while strafing takes twice as long.
Sidewinder.5: Your strafe speed is increased by 35%, but accelerating and decelerating while strafing takes twice as long. In addition, you no longer appear highlighted on IRNV optics.

Survivalist.1: Reduces your passive shield recharge delay by 0.5 seconds, and whenever your shield breaks, your sprint speed is increased by 20% for 3 seconds. Taking damage will remove the added sprint speed. <font color="#dc9c36">12 second cooldown after triggering.</font>
Survivalist.2: Reduces your passive shield recharge delay by 0.6 seconds, and whenever your shield breaks, your sprint speed is increased by 20% for 3.5 seconds. Taking damage will remove the added sprint speed. <font color="#dc9c36">12 second cooldown after triggering.</font>
Survivalist.3: Reduces your passive shield recharge delay by 0.75 seconds, and whenever your shield breaks, your sprint speed is increased by 20% for 4.5 seconds. Taking damage will remove the added sprint speed. <font color="#dc9c36">12 second cooldown after triggering.</font>
Survivalist.4: Reduces your passive shield recharge delay by 1 second, and whenever your shield breaks, your sprint speed is increased by 20% for 6 seconds. Taking damage will remove the added sprint speed. <font color="#dc9c36">12 second cooldown after triggering.</font>
Survivalist.5: Reduces your passive shield recharge delay by 1 second, and whenever your shield breaks, your sprint speed is increased by 20% for 6 seconds and you heal for 150 health over the same duration. Taking damage will remove the added sprint speed. <font color="#dc9c36">12 second cooldown after triggering.</font>

Sweeper HUD.1: Target range is displayed on your crosshair, and enemy explosives within 16 meters are automatically spotted.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in ground vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Sweeper HUD.2: Target range is displayed on your crosshair, and enemy explosives within 18 meters are automatically spotted.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in ground vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Sweeper HUD.3: Target range is displayed on your crosshair, and enemy explosives within 21 meters are automatically spotted.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in ground vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Sweeper HUD.4: Target range is displayed on your crosshair, and enemy explosives within 25 meters are automatically spotted.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in ground vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Sweeper HUD.5: Target range is displayed on your crosshair, and enemy explosives within 35 meters are automatically spotted.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in ground vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>

Symbiote.1: Passively receive 20% small arms resistance. This does not stack with Nanoweave Armor. Any time you are alive for longer than 20 seconds without taking small arms damage, the symbiote will gnaw at your health pool.
Symbiote.2: Passively receive 20% small arms resistance. This does not stack with Nanoweave Armor. Any time you are alive for longer than 22 seconds without taking small arms damage, the symbiote will gnaw at your health pool.
Symbiote.3: Passively receive 20% small arms resistance. This does not stack with Nanoweave Armor. Any time you are alive for longer than 25 seconds without taking small arms damage, the symbiote will gnaw at your health pool.
Symbiote.4: Passively receive 20% small arms resistance. This does not stack with Nanoweave Armor. Any time you are alive for longer than 30 seconds without taking small arms damage, the symbiote will gnaw at your health pool.
Symbiote.5: Passively receive 20% small arms resistance. This does not stack with Nanoweave Armor. Any time you are alive for longer than 30 seconds without taking small arms damage or killing an enemy player, the symbiote will gnaw at your health pool.

Target Focus.1: Displays the target's health bar while spotted, increases crosshair IFF detection range, and increases hold breath duration by 150%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip. Works in vehicles.</font>
Target Focus.2: Displays the target's health bar while spotted, increases crosshair IFF detection range, and increases hold breath duration by 160%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip. Works in vehicles.</font>
Target Focus.3: Displays the target's health bar while spotted, increases crosshair IFF detection range, and increases hold breath duration by 175%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip. Works in vehicles.</font>
Target Focus.4: Displays the target's health bar while spotted, increases crosshair IFF detection range, and increases hold breath duration by 200%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip. Works in vehicles.</font>
Target Focus.5: Displays the target's health bar while spotted, increases crosshair IFF detection range, and increases hold breath duration by 300%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip. Works in vehicles.</font>

Vampire.1: Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 175 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Vampire.2: Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 200 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Vampire.3: Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 250 health. This effect does not trigger from quick melee attacks.
Vampire.4: Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Vampire.5: Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
